mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PROJECTIDX) FROM owl.PROJECTLIST WHERE EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT I.ISSUEIDX, I.ISSUETITLE AS 'SUBJECT', I.DUEDATE, I.PRIORITYCODE, I.ASSIGNED, M.NAME AS 'ASSIGNEDNAME', I.PROJECTIDX, P.PROJECTNAME FROM owl.ISSUE I JOIN PROJECT P ON I.PROJECTIDX = P.PROJECTIDX LEFT JOIN owl.MEMBER M ON I.ASSIGNED = M.EMAIL WHERE I.ASSIGNED = #{assigned} AND I.ISSUEPROGRESS = "OPEN" ORDER BY I.DUEDATE, (CASE WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="URGENT" THEN 1 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="HIGH" THEN 2 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="MEDIUM" THEN 3 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="LOW" THEN 4 ELSE 5 END)

SELECT I.ISSUEIDX, I.ISSUETITLE AS 'SUBJECT', I.DUEDATE, I.PRIORITYCODE, I.ASSIGNED, M.NAME AS 'ASSIGNEDNAME', I.PROJECTIDX, P.PROJECTNAME FROM owl.ISSUE I JOIN PROJECT P ON I.PROJECTIDX = P.PROJECTIDX LEFT JOIN owl.MEMBER M ON I.ASSIGNED = M.EMAIL WHERE I.ASSIGNED = #{param2} AND I.PROJECTIDX = #{param1} AND I.ISSUEPROGRESS = "OPEN" ORDER BY I.DUEDATE, (CASE WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="URGENT" THEN 1 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="HIGH" THEN 2 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="MEDIUM" THEN 3 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="LOW" THEN 4 ELSE 5 END)

SELECT I.ISSUEIDX, I.ISSUETITLE AS 'SUBJECT', I.DUEDATE, I.PRIORITYCODE, I.ASSIGNED, M.NAME AS 'ASSIGNEDNAME', I.PROJECTIDX, P.PROJECTNAME FROM owl.ISSUE I JOIN PROJECT P ON I.PROJECTIDX = P.PROJECTIDX LEFT JOIN owl.MEMBER M ON I.ASSIGNED = M.EMAIL WHERE I.PROJECTIDX = #{projectIdx} AND I.ISSUEPROGRESS = "OPEN" ORDER BY I.DUEDATE, (CASE WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="URGENT" THEN 1 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="HIGH" THEN 2 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="MEDIUM" THEN 3 WHEN I.PRIORITYCODE="LOW" THEN 4 ELSE 5 END)

SELECT p.PROJECTIDX, p.PROJECTNAME, i.ASSIGNED, i.ISSUEPROGRESS , t.PROJECTCOLOR FROM PROJECT p JOIN ISSUE i ON p.PROJECTIDX=i.PROJECTIDX LEFT JOIN PROJECTLIST t ON p.PROJECTIDX=t.PROJECTIDX where i.ASSIGNED = #{email} AND i.ISSUEPROGRESS in('OPEN', 'CLOSED')

SELECT i.ASSIGNED, i.ISSUEPROGRESS , t.PROJECTCOLOR, t.PROJECTIDX FROM PROJECTLIST t JOIN ISSUE i ON t.PROJECTIDX=i.PROJECTIDX where i.ASSIGNED = #{param1} AND t.PROJECTIDX = #{param2} AND i.ISSUEPROGRESS in('OPEN', 'CLOSED')
SELECT PROJECTIDX, ISSUEPROGRESS, ASSIGNED FROM ISSUE WHERE PROJECTIDX =#{projectIdx} AND ISSUEPROGRESS in('OPEN', 'CLOSED')

SELECT i.ISSUEIDX, i.ISSUEPROGRESS, i.PROJECTIDX, l.LABELNAME, l.LABELCOLOR FROM LABEL l JOIN ISSUE i ON l.LABELIDX=i.LABELIDX where i.PROJECTIDX = #{projectIdx} AND i.ISSUEPROGRESS in('OPEN', 'CLOSED')

SELECT P.PROJECTNAME, I.ISSUETITLE AS 'SUBJECT', I.DUEDATE, L.PROJECTCOLOR FROM OWL.ISSUE I JOIN owl.PROJECT P ON I.PROJECTIDX = P.PROJECTIDX JOIN owl.PROJECTLIST L ON P.PROJECTIDX = L.PROJECTIDX AND L.EMAIL = #{email} WHERE I.DUEDATE BETWEEN DATE(NOW()) AND DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL + 7 DAY) ORDER BY I.DUEDATE, P.PROJECTNAME

SELECT P.PROJECTNAME, I.ISSUETITLE AS 'SUBJECT', I.DUEDATE, L.PROJECTCOLOR FROM OWL.ISSUE I JOIN owl.PROJECT P ON I.PROJECTIDX = P.PROJECTIDX JOIN owl.PROJECTLIST L ON P.PROJECTIDX = L.PROJECTIDX WHERE I.PROJECTIDX = #{projectIdx} AND I.DUEDATE BETWEEN DATE(NOW()) AND DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL + 7 DAY) ORDER BY I.DUEDATE, P.PROJECTNAME

SELECT p.PROJECTIDX, p.PROJECTNAME, i.ISSUEPROGRESS , t.PROJECTCOLOR FROM PROJECT p JOIN ISSUE i ON p.PROJECTIDX=i.PROJECTIDX LEFT JOIN PROJECTLIST t ON p.PROJECTIDX=t.PROJECTIDX where t.EMAIL = #{email} AND i.ISSUEPROGRESS in ('OPEN', 'CLOSED')
